name: Summer Camp
description: Grades 1-5 campers explore the city’s vibrant neighborhoods, rich history, and creative culture. campCDS is open to the public, in addition to all current and incoming CDS students, and serves students from preschool to Grade 5. All camps begin and end at Children’s Day School, located at 333 Dolores Street in San Francisco. Camp starts at 8:00am and ends at 3:00pm. Optional: extend your camper’s day to 5:30pm for an additional cost.
